author: summisimeon
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Last 16
body:
Hello everyone,here is the [link](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) for original post to read how to make predictions

Here are my picks

1 | France | vs | Argentina | 2
1 | Uruguay | vs | Portugal | 0
2 | Spain | vs | Russia | 0
1 | Croatia | vs | Denmark | 1
2 | Brazil | vs | Mexico | 1
2 | Belgium | vs | Japan | 0
1 | Sweden | vs | Switzerland |1
0 | Colombia | vs | England | 1

Thank you 
Yours @summisimeon

author: josegregori
title: La Copa Mundial @blocktrades | Mis predicciones  para los últimos 16
body:
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png

<center>Nos vemos nuevamente en la segunda ronda, con muchas sorpresas en esta primera fase, que ninguno imaginó, pero esto pasa en el  fútbol, son 90 minutos de juego  donde la pelota rueda hasta el pitazo final. donde solo llega un ganador, o se gana o se pierde, todos los equipos participantes tienen el propósito de llevarse hacia su país el trofeo mundial, ya sea por primera vez o agregar uno trofeo mas a su historia,  de las 16 hay  6 selecciones que han obtenido el premio máximo. Solo queda desear suerte a todos y que  gane el mejor.</center>

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Argentina | 1
2| Uruguay | vs | Portugal | 1
2 | Spain | vs | Russia | 0
3| Croatia | vs | Denmark | 1
3 | Brazil | vs | Mexico | 1
2 | Belgium | vs | Japan |0
2 | Sweden | vs | Switzerland |0
1 | Colombia | vs | England | 3

<center> Aqui les dejo los link para indagar mas sobre este concurso:
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/full-standings-as-of-june-26-the-blocktrades-world-cup</center>

<center>https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool.</center>

<center> Agradeciendo a los patrocinadores de este gran evento, como han sido @blocktrades   @anomadsoul y @acidyo que han creado este concurso, siendo muy facil solo consiste en predecir los resultados del juego, y donde se espera que la suerte esté de nuestro lado y de  todos los fanáticos del fútbol. </center>


![Presentación1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNaeehZaeTqMDum6uVqTYX8gfuVEFnUxFkLzqWqZ2RuAN/Presentaci%C3%B3n1.jpg)

author: palomot
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Last 16
body:
Hi Dear Friends! This is my selections for the knockout stage Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | France | vs | Argentina | 0 2 | Uruguay | vs | Portugal | 1 1 | Spain | vs | Russia | 1 3 | Croatia | vs | Denmark | 0 1 | Brazil | vs | Mexico | 2 2 | Belgium | vs | Japan | 1 3 | Sweden | vs | Switzerland |0 1 | Colombia | vs | England | 1
![palomot](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme97oFDgWrWtMwJ19sHAkx2hBbRTeeR3PUiPQTNUuWc1d/image.png)

author: josegregori
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Last 16
body:
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png

<center>See you again in the second round, with many surprises in this first phase, which none imagined, but this is football, are 90 minutes of play and suffering, where the adrenaline grows for every second of play, are many faces of joy but also sadness, where the ball rolls until the final whistle. where only one winner comes, here a draw is not valid, or is won or lost, where everyone has a purpose to give his country or the world trophy, either for the first time or add a trophy, as it is the case of 6 selections that have had the maximum award. It only remains to wish everyone luck and to win the best.</center>


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Argentina | 1
2| Uruguay | vs | Portugal | 1
2 | Spain | vs | Russia | 0
3| Croatia | vs | Denmark | 1
3 | Brazil | vs | Mexico | 1
2 | Belgium | vs | Japan |0
2 | Sweden | vs | Switzerland |0
1 | Colombia | vs | England | 3


<center>Although as a good Latin American, I'm going to one of the big teams, like Brazil. So I leave you with these links for any questions about the contest.</center>

<center>https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/full-standings-as-of-june-26-the-blocktrades-world-cup</center>

<center>https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool.</center>

<center>Thanking the sponsors of this great event as they have been @anomadsoul and @ acidyo who have created this contest, where you only have to predict the results of the game, and where the luck is expected to be on our side and all the fans of the Football.</center> 

![Presentación1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNaeehZaeTqMDum6uVqTYX8gfuVEFnUxFkLzqWqZ2RuAN/Presentaci%C3%B3n1.jpg)
